column4: hi i need help how to install 2 packages (private if possible) thank you!
that is not the way to install things in Ubuntu
install from the synaptic package manager
you want the java plugin for opera? or is this a separate issue
just checking on opera, the java is in the partner repo
or go into synaptic package manager and enable the partner repo
once you have reloaded the packages list, then search for java
do you have synaptic package manager open in front of you?
so click the tab other software, put a check on the canonical partners
close that window, then hit reload
did you update the sources yet? ie reload?
so search for the sun-java packages
you got the .deb from opera homepage, right? just double click it to install
